column4: is thisi normal? auto see and auto mount of ntfs partitions with feisty?
I believe so - it's a nice feature, huh?
These are the reasons why ubuntu is recommended so often....heh

I have several clients on Ubuntu and I always test the new releases to see which clients would benafit from it. This one I could not get to boot on this hp lappy, then I remembered an old school trick, on the live cd, type noapic noalpic nacpi. It comes with a broken bios lol
